timeline.message: Increment package version after release of com.azure azure-security-keyvault-certificates
Increment package version after release of com.azure azure-security-keyvault-keys
Increment package version after release of com.azure azure-security-keyvault-administration
Increment package version after release of com.azure azure-security-keyvault-secrets

Updated unreleased_ Key Vault entry in version_client.txt. Updated the Cosmos POM to properly use the "unreleased_" prefix so the version number gets updated properly updated by the versioning script.

timeline.bodyText: We need to make sure the Cosmos team is aware of this dependency as it will become an issue for their next release as they will need to wait until keyvault releases.
timeline.author: weshaggard

replies.bodyText: @kushagraThapar Similar to the Identity situation here cosmos could be taking a dependency tag unless we really need the source updates from KV for the azure-cosmos-encryption package.
replies.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: Made a small change at the end of this from current to dependency, else the pipelines would complain when verifying POM versions.
replies.author: vcolin7

timeline.message: Fixed a small mistake with the Cosmos POM.

Merge branch 'master' into increment-package-version-keyvault-534537

# Conflicts:
#	eng/versioning/version_client.txt
#	sdk/cosmos/azure-cosmos-encryption/pom.xml

timeline.bodyText: Lets update the storage dependency to beta_
timeline.author: samvaity
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -129,7 +129,7 @@ com.microsoft.azure:spring-cloud-starter-azure-appconfiguration-config;1.2.8-bet
 # Format;
 # unreleased_<groupId>:<artifactId>;dependency-version
 # note: The unreleased dependencies will not be manipulated with the automatic PR creation code.
-unreleased_com.azure:azure-security-keyvault-keys;4.3.0-beta.1
+unreleased_com.azure:azure-security-keyvault-keys;4.3.0-beta.2

timeline.message: Updated a Storage Cryptography test dependency on Key Vault to use `beta_` instead of `unreleased_`.
